## redux-testing package

Implementation of helper functions and mocks to assist in the implementation of testcases for redux based modules.

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [createFetchTextOnFolder(aFolder, aLogSvc)](./redux-testing.createfetchtextonfolder.md) |  |
|  [createReduxRootStoreOnFolder(aFolder, aLogSvc)](./redux-testing.createreduxrootstoreonfolder.md) |  |
|  [createUrlConfigFromBaseURL(aBaseURL)](./redux-testing.createurlconfigfrombaseurl.md) | Constructs a <code>UrlConfig</code> structure based on a base URL |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [DEFAULT\_URL\_CONFIG](./redux-testing.default_url_config.md) | Some arbitray default configuration that can be used for testing purposes. |
|  [VERSION](./redux-testing.version.md) | Version and build number of the package |
